When you mute someone, you'll see them here.
They're not following any people or games.
We've added some new things and made others better.
Before you can continue, we need to update the app.
Sorry, there's a problem with your account. Sign in to Xbox.com for more info.
We've updated the Xbox terms of use. Go read it now on Xbox.com.
Sign up for an account on Xbox.com.
You need an Internet connection to use this app. Check your connection and try again.
We can't sign you in right now. Try again later.
Your privacy settings are blocking you from using this feature.
You're at your friends limit, so you need to remove a friend before you can add a new one.
None of your friends have played this game
When they do, come back and compare.
You're the only one of your friends who's unlocked this achievement lately.

We can't send this right now. Try again later.
Something went wrong with loading this info. Try again later.

Keep checking back for the latest news about this game.
None of your friends have unlocked this achievement lately
Due to your past behavior, you can't edit your profile
Your feedback has been sent to Xbox.
Thanks for taking the time to help make Xbox a better place to play.
We couldn't send your report. Click Report to Xbox to try again.
To use your own account, check out the Xbox App on your Windows 10 device.
We're still working on it, but we couldn't wait to give you a sneak peek. We update regularly, so keep checking back to see what's changed.
We can't wait for you to see what's in this update:
Edit and share GameDVR clips with any editor
Share to Twitter from Xbox app
Top PC game support, including online presence and game hubs
See your Xbox friends in the People app on Windows
More is on the way—keep checking back to see what's changed!
We don't have any friend suggestions for you right now. When we have more, they'll show up right here. Check back later.
Xbox is better with friends! As you add them, they'll show up here.
Are you sure you want to delete this message?
Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?
Are you sure you want to delete these conversations?
Are you sure you want to block this user?
Things sure are quiet around here. Try sending a message!
You haven't sent this message yet. If you continue, it'll be lost. Are you sure?
Because of your past behavior, you can’t send messages.
More ways to play. Join us!
You haven't played anything lately. When you do, it’ll show up here.

Xbox is better with friends. Add some from our suggestions, or find someone by their gamertag if you know it.

Add someone as a favorite and you'll see them here.
We can't show your followers right now. Try again later.
When someone adds you as a friend, you'll see them here.
We can't show recent players right now. Try again later.
When you play online games or chat with people, you'll see them here.

To check or change your privacy and online & safety settings go to:
When people like, share, and comment on things in your activity feed, or add you as a friend, you'll see it here.

Your comments are shared – don't include any personal info.

There aren’t any new phone friends to add right now. We’ll keep looking, though.
That didn't work. Try adding your caption again.
There's nothing to share right now
When you unlock achievements and capture screenshots and game clips, you'll see them here.
Sorry, we couldn't return an image. You can still post the link.
We successfully posted to your showcase, but we can't post to your feed right now. Try again in a while.
We successfully posted to your feed, but we can't post to your showcase right now. Try again in a while.
Sorry, we couldn't follow the link. Try again in a while.
What to share? It's your choice.
Go to Settings and choose what you show in your activity feed.
No matching friends. Select the Search button to search all of Xbox.
We can't turn on your console. Make sure this device is on the same network as your console and your console is set to instant-on.
We couldn't turn off your Xbox. Make sure your device and your console are connected to the same network, your console is set to instant on, and you're signed in with the same account in both places.
Xbox One not listed? Enter your console's IP address:
We couldn't connect to your console. Make sure the console is still on and connected to the same network as this device.
We couldn't find an Xbox One console with the IP address provided.
Show keyboard when I'm typing on my console
This info is blocked. To change this, on your Xbox, go to Settings > Privacy & online safety.
Connect to your Xbox to watch this show.
Can't get your channels right now. Select the refresh button to try again.
Select the refresh button to try again.
Connect to your Xbox to use this device as your TV remote.
Set up TV on your Xbox.
On your Xbox, go to Settings > TV & OneGuide > Device control, choose Cable or satellite box, and then choose Cable or satellite box setup.
The current source can't be controlled by the Xbox app remote.
Something went wrong with your stream. Try stopping and restarting it. If it keeps happening, close and restart the Xbox app, restart your console, or restart your router.
This program is blocked. To change this, on your Xbox, go to Settings > Privacy & online safety.
To set up TV streaming, sign in on the console with the same account you use here.
There's a problem with your console that's keeping you from streaming TV. Try again later. If it keeps happening, restart your console.
Sorry, you can't play interactive content. Try another channel.
This channel isn't available right now. See the OneGuide to see what's available on other channels.
Can't get your channels right now.
Something is wrong with the stream. Try again later.
Connect to your Xbox to view TV listings.
A premium TV experience that is personalized for you
OneGuide brings all your TV programming together. Set up TV on the console to see it.
This may take a few minutes.
Connect to your Xbox to view your recent channels.
Watch TV on your Xbox to see your recent channels
Connect to your Xbox to view your favorite channels.
Your favorite TV channels in one place
Tap a show in TV listings and then tap the
To use the volume buttons, you need to set up TV device control. On your Xbox One, go to Settings > TV & OneGuide > Device control > TV.
If you shared it with your friends, they'll still be able to see it.
If you saved a copy on your PC, it won't be deleted.
Something went wrong. Try again later.
That name won’t work. Pick another one and try again.

Once you share, you can't edit it anymore. It may be shared with your friends and the wider Xbox Live community. This capture will be reviewed to make sure it follows the Xbox Live Code of Conduct, so there may be a delay before others can see your capture.
Record in the background while I'm playing a game
Allow background recording when using battery power
Allow background recording while I'm using wireless display

Learn how to save in another folder

Record game clips and screenshots using Game DVR
Game DVR has been turned off by your organization
After starting a recording, automatically save a clip when it reaches this length
Open Game bar, Windows shortcut, Windows key + G, your shortcut, {0}
Record that, Windows shortcut, Windows key + Alt + G, your shortcut, {0}
Start or stop a recording, Windows shortcut, Windows key + Alt + R, your shortcut, {0}
Take a screenshot, Windows shortcut, Windows key + Alt + Print Screen, your shortcut, {0}
Show or hide the recording timer, Windows shortcut, Windows key + Alt + T, {0}
Turn microphone recording on or off, Windows shortcut, Windows key + Alt + M, your shortcut, {0}
That shortcut is taken. Pick another one and try again.
That shortcut won't work. Pick another one and try again.
That won't work. Use Ctrl, Alt, or Shift and at least one other key.
Sorry, Game DVR won't work on this PC. To use it, you need to install the Media Feature Pack.
Record my microphone next time I record a game
Your microphone will be recorded with all game clips by default. To turn the mic off and on for a particular session, press the Windows key + Alt + M.
Swipe to move. Tap to select.
We couldn't stream from your console. Try again later.
Tell us what you liked, report a problem, or make a suggestion.
Ran into several problems that affected the game
Couldn't play the game at all
We'll use your feedback to improve your experience.
Connect to a console to start streaming a game
Hide game streaming button on home
You can share your real name with your friends on Xbox - you choose who to share it with. Your name doesn't show up in games, and you can always change these settings in your profile.
Choose Set up name sharing to pick the people you want to share your name with.
You can't share your real name because of your past behavior.
We can't set up or change your real name sharing settings right now.
This is how you'll appear to other people on Xbox, using the real name from your Microsoft account. If it doesn't look right, you can edit it now.
This will change the name on the Microsoft account for {0}. This name is used to identify you across a broad range of Microsoft products and services.
When you share your name with friends, their friends see it, too. You can change these settings any time from your profile.
Sorry, we can't change your name right now. Click Save to try again or go back.
Sorry, we can't save your name sharing settings right now. Select Done to try saving again.
To run the test, you need to connect to your Xbox
Please wait while we run the test. Make sure you don't close the app or leave this page until it's done.
This is where you'll find your game clips and screenshots. Next time you're playing a game, press the Windows key + G to capture some.
When you share captures, you’ll see them here.
To start the test, sign in on your Xbox with the same account you're using on your PC.
Help us make streaming better by letting us run a quick test.
Sorry, invites for this game don’t work anymore
We can't connect to your Xbox One. Make sure it's turned on and connected to the network, then try again.
Game streaming is turned off on your Xbox One. To turn it back on, go to your console and open Settings > Preferences.
Your network doesn't have enough bandwidth to stream games at that quality. Pick a lower quality in Settings and try again.
Your network is slow, which might affect game streaming. Other devices on your network could be slowing you down if they’re using too much bandwidth.
Your wireless connection might not be strong enough to stream a game. It might help if you move your PC or Xbox One closer to your wireless router.
A wired connection is always best for game streaming.
If you want to use the Xbox button to go Home on your console when you're streaming a game, you need to change a setting in Game bar. Open Game bar > Settings and change the {0} setting.
There are no controllers attached to this PC. Attach one to either this PC or to your Xbox One and press continue.
Another game is active on this Xbox right now. If you continue, the active player might be interrupted.
The connection to your console isn't strong enough to stream a game. To help fix this, try the network test.
To continue, sign in on your console using this account.
This game or app can't be streamed.
This video is protected and can't be streamed.
Can't stream because either the Xbox app or your console needs to be updated. Make sure they're both up to date and try again.
Let's keep it clean - pick another name and try again.
You have reached the limit of 200 favorites.
Failed to add to My Channels. Please retry.
Add a game from your PC
You don't have any games yet
Now that you've shared your name with {0}...
...how do you want to share it with other people? When you share your real name, friends of friend see it, too. It doesn't show up in games, and you can always change these settings in your profile.
Sorry, we can't add this person right now. Try again in a while.
Sorry, we can't save your changes right now. Try again in a while.
Sorry, we could only save some of your changes. Try saving again.
Let {0} see my real name. It might help them recognize who you are.
{0} may not recognize you as {1}. They're sharing their name with you. Check the box to share with them.
Favorite friends go first on your friends list. You'll see when they go online or start broadcasting.
Friends show up on your friends list and activity feed. They see you as a new follower.
You share your real name with {0} on Xbox. Make changes in Settings.

When they do, they'll show up here.

You can't join a party because you're already in one somewhere else.

Make it less than 30 minutes long and try again.
There might be a problem with the service, or it could be because of your privacy settings or past behavior. To check your privacy settings, go to Xbox.com.
Sorry, this capture can't be shared
Pick a game to upload it to Xbox Live.
Your storage is full. Delete some captures to make space.
We can't show this right now.
Your showcase is full. If you still want to add this, go to your showcase and remove a thing or two.

Something went wrong with your party. Try again later.

You get to do this once for free. Your new gamertag can be up to 15 characters long (upper and lower case letters, numbers, and single spaces are ok).
We can’t change your gamertag right now. Try again later.
You already used your free gamertag change. To do it again, you'll need to buy a gamertag change on Xbox.com.

We can’t change colors right now. Try again later.
We can’t save your changes right now. Try again later.

We'll add friends to your suggestions as they link their Facebook accounts to Xbox. Facebook friends will see your gamertag and Facebook name in their suggestions.

Your purchase is complete. On your Xbox, find it in your games & apps under Ready to Install, at the end of your list of games or apps. To download future purchases automatically, designate your home Xbox in Settings > My home Xbox.

This will automatically install on your home Xbox. (Make sure your Xbox is on or set to instant on; automatic updates and purchases are on; and there's enough space.) To make a console your home Xbox, go to Settings > My home Xbox. For power and download options, go to Settings > Power & startup.
Items like these can be purchased as often as you like. Come back and buy it anytime.
We could not find any Xbox One games. Please try a different category or refresh the page.
We have nothing to show just now.

Until the next Xbox One system update, the games you buy in the Xbox app will only work on consoles in the preview program. After the update, you can play them on any Xbox One. If your console isn't in the preview, buy the game on your console.
Get together with friends to chat or play games. Or go to your friends list to join a party.
Keep checking back for the latest news.
